title: [This week in Britain. No. 18. Motor show week]
brief_description:
Cinemagazine item: MIRA (Motor Industry Research Association) testing various cars at its research track, including a Humber Hillman Snipe, a sportscar, a motor caravan, Austin 7 and Mini-minor station wagons.
Presented by Noelene Pritchard.
